lead_paragraph: Arthur Lomando, a former New York City police officer who threw himself in front of a train after the killing, insisted on his innocence in court.

headline.main: Ex-Police Officer Pleads Not Guilty in Fatal Stabbing

snippet: Arthur Lomando, a former New York City police officer who threw himself in front of a train after the killing, insisted on his innocence in court.
abstract: Former New York City Police Officer Arthur Lomando pleads not guilty to murdering his former girlfriend Suzanne Bardzell in New Jersey; Lomando is accused of fatally stabbing Bardzell, and authorities say he threw himself in front of New York City subway train in failed suicide attempt after slaying.
